/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are adorned with colorful signs and advertisements, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the street, indicating a busy time of day. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day.
